title: UAE: Driving on Dubai-Sharjah route while fasting during Ramadan 2026? Experts warn of serious fatigue dangers on road
summary_full: UAE authorities are issuing urgent safety alerts for drivers during Ramadan 2026, particularly those on long commutes. Experts warn that fasting-induced fatigue, dehydration and reduced alertness, especially in the late afternoon, significantly increase accident risks. Drivers are urged to prioritise rest, plan travel strategically and maintain calm to ensure everyone's safety on the roads.
